Description: An additional description of the flowpath type, that refers only to reach flowpaths (10-Observed, 20-Inferred, 99-Unspecified).
Describes the importance of the flowpath (1-Primary, 2-Secondary).
Length in metres (m) of the flowpath
References the id field in the Names table.
Link to the id field in the AOI table.
The id of the nexus at the “from” end of this flowpath
The id of the nexus at the “to” end of this flowpath
The id of the containing ECatchment
